text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-PatientImportance
  • Include all codes defined in http://ibm.com/fhir/cdm/CodeSystem/patient-status-code-system

name: PatientStatusValueSet
title: Patient Status Value Set
description: Examples of client-specified patient status codes
